title: Claim details - claim type discrimination
h1: What type of discrimination are you claiming?

detailsText.p1: Discrimination is when you're treated unfairly and the treatment is related to any of the protected characteristics from the 2010 Equality Act. You have rights at work if you have experienced discrimination.
detailsText.p2: See the GOV.UK guidance (opens in new tab) for further information on protected characteristics and your workplace rights.

claimTypeDiscrimination.required: Tell us what type/s of discrimination you are claiming
